 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָפַל‎</span> **verb** ==swell== (?; so [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]; inferred from derivatives; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is a ***tumour*** in the vulva or anus, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> apparently denominative (compare II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹפֶל‎</span>) see Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***uplu***</u></abbr>, probably ***tumour*** ([[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 7</sup> ***ublu***, but see [[BDB#Jen|Jen]]<sup>ThLz 1895, 250</sup>)); — 

**Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֻפְּלָה‎</span> [[Hab.2.4|Hab 2:4]] according to [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשׁוֺ‎</span>, compare [[BDB#GASm|GASm]]); but substantive needed, [[BDB#Brd|Brd]]<sup>SK 1889, 121</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנֶּעֱלָף‎</span>, [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעַוָּל‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Gu|Gu]]<sup>Kau.</sup> — 

**Hiph\`il** see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עפל‎</span>. below 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָפַל‎</span>] **verb** perhaps ==be heedless== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be heedless, neglectful, inadvertent)***; — 

**Hiph\`il** ***shew heedlessness, Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעְפִּלוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעֲלוֺת‎</span> [[Num.14.44|Num 14:44]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) ***they shewed heedlessness in going up*** (went up heedlessly), so de Dieu, cited (and allowed) by [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex</sup>; &gt; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and others ***shewed presumption*** (I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עפל‎</span>, this sense dubious).
